verses.verse: Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H8104>Keep<s%> ye <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6666>justice:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> my <S%H3444>salvation<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H935>come,<s%> and my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to be <S%H1540>revealed.<s%>

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the <S%H582>man<s%> that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> that layeth <S%H2388>hold<s%> on it; that <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> from <S%H4480>polluting<s%> <S%H2490><s%> it, and <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H4480>doing<s%> <S%H6213><s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

Neither <S%H408><s%> let the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H5236>stranger,<s%> that hath joined <S%H3867>himself<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath utterly <S%H914>separated<s%> <S%H914><s%> me <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> let the <S%H5631>eunuch<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am a <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H6086>tree.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> and <S%H977>choose<s%> the things <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H2654>please<s%> me, and take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of my <S%H1285>covenant;<s%>

Even unto them will I <S%H5414>give<s%> in mine <S%H1004>house<s%> and within my <S%H2346>walls<s%> a <S%H3027>place<s%> and a <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> than of <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and of <S%H4480>daughters:<s%> <S%H1323><s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>

Also the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5236>stranger,<s%> that join <S%H3867>themselves<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H8334>serve<s%> him, and to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> from <S%H4480>polluting<s%> <S%H2490><s%> it, and taketh <S%H2388>hold<s%> of my <S%H1285>covenant;<s%>

Even them will I <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and make them <S%H8055>joyful<s%> in my <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8605>prayer:<s%> their burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> shall be <S%H7522>accepted<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> mine <S%H4196>altar;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> mine <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8605>prayer<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> which <S%H6908>gathereth<s%> the <S%H1760>outcasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5002>saith,<s%> <S%H5750>Yet<s%> will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> others <S%H5921>to<s%> him, beside those that are <S%H6908>gathered<s%> unto him.
All <S%H3605><s%> ye <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H857>come<s%> to <S%H398>devour,<s%> yea, <S%H3605>all<s%> ye <S%H2416>beasts<s%> in the <S%H3293>forest.<s%>

His <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> are <S%H5787>blind:<s%> they are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3808>ignorant,<s%> <S%H3045><s%> they are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H483>dumb<s%> <S%H3611>dogs,<s%> they <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5024>bark;<s%> <S%H1957>sleeping,<s%> lying <S%H7901>down,<s%> <S%H157>loving<s%> to <S%H5123>slumber.<s%>

Yea, they are <S%H5794>greedy<s%> <S%H5315><s%> <S%H3611>dogs<s%> which can <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H3045>have<s%> <S%H7654>enough,<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> are <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> that <S%H3045>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H995>understand:<s%> they <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6437>look<s%> to their own <S%H1870>way,<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> for his <S%H1215>gain,<s%> from his <S%H4480>quarter.<s%> <S%H7097><s%>

Come <S%H857><s%> ye, say they, I will <S%H3947>fetch<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and we will <S%H5433>fill<s%> ourselves with strong <S%H7941>drink;<s%> and <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H3966>much<s%> more <S%H3499>abundant.<s%> <S%H1419><s%>
